articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: iPhones might be harder for police to unlock, thanks to new reboot feature - TechCrunch
articles.description: New code introduced in the latest version of Apple's mobile operating system could make it more difficult for both police and thieves to unlock iPhones.
articles.content:
New code introduced in the latest version of Apple’s mobile operating system could make it more difficult for both police and thieves to unlock iPhones.
